alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 03 at 12:03PM MDT until April 03 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE NORTHEAST PLAINS NEAR THE WYOMING-NEBRASKA BORDER...FIRE WEATHER ZONES 242...248... 250 AND 251... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 242, 248, 250 and 251. * Timing...Now until 7 pm MDT. * Winds...North 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent. * Impacts...Any fire that develops will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning should be avoided, as well as any activity that may produce a spark.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Logan County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County
